Test Name: Hemophilia A F8 Gene, Intron 1 and Intron 22 Inversion Mutation Analysis (Prenatal)
Specimen Type: Amniotic fluid or Chorionic Villus Sampling (CVS)
Purpose: To detect intron 1 and intron 22 inversion mutations in the F8 gene for prenatal diagnosis of Hemophilia A.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container suitable for amniotic fluid or CVS tissue
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus, capillary electrophoresis or sequencing system
